pages.text: What is (wrong) with you, how do you judge
Will you not then mind
Or have you a clear authority
Then come with your book if you are truthful
And they assign a relationship between Him and the jinn and the jinn know that they will be presented (before Him)
glorified be God (He is far) from that which they describe
except the servants, exclusively of God
So you and that which you serve (worship)
you cannot mislead (anyone) against Him
except him who is to enter hell
And there is no one among us, but there is a known place for him
and we are certainly those set in ranks
and we are certainly those who glorify
And they used to say
“Had we with us, a reminder of the ancients
we would have definitely been servants, exclusively of God.”
But (now) they do not believe in this (Quran), so they will know
And Our word has already gone forth in respect of Our servants, the messengers
that they will certainly be helped
And Our forces, they will be victors
So turn away from them till a time
and keep seeing them, for they (too) will see
Do they seek to hasten on Our punishment
But when it comes down in their court, then evil will be the morning of those warned
And turn away from them till a time
and keep seeing, for they (too) will see
Glorified be your Lord, Lord of Might, (He is far) from that which they describe
and peace on the messengers
and praise is due only for God, the Lord of the worlds
